DEPOT.DESCRIPTION: This module allows you to List, Create, Edit and Delete a Depot
DEPOT.EDIT_DEPOT: Edit the information in a Depot
DEPOT.LABEL: Depot
DEPOT.NO_DEPOT_ASSIGNED_TO_USER: You are not allowed to access any depot or there's no depot registered yet. Please contact the administrator if needed
DEPOT.NOT_ALLOWED_ACTIONS: This depot is protected.  You cannot modify its properties.
DEPOT.TITLE: Depot Management
DEPOT.WAREHOUSE_INFO: This depot can distribute to other depots

MODAL.NO_DEFAULT_DEPOT: You need to choose a depot.
MODAL.SELECTION_EXPLANATION: It looks like you don't have a default depot set!  Please select your depot from the list below.  You will only need to do this once.
MODAL.MORE_DEPOT_WARNING: You have a large number of depots, please look for the depot by typing its name in the search input zone
